ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.deck.item

Interface MasterOpacityStyle

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Style
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomTile

    public interface MasterOpacityStyle
extends Style
    Interface implemented by items that support a master opacity change.
    Since:
    3.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getOpacity()
      Returns the master opacity value of the item.
      void setOpacity(float opacity)
      Sets the master opacity for the item to the specified value, which must be between 0 (completely transparent) and 1 (completely opaque).

    • Method Detail

      • getOpacity

        float getOpacity()
        Returns the master opacity value of the item.
        Returns:
        the opacity level, from 0 (completely transparent) to 1 (completely opaque)

      • setOpacity

        void setOpacity(float opacity)
        Sets the master opacity for the item to the specified value, which must be between 0 (completely transparent) and 1 (completely opaque). This affects the master opacity of the item: if the item contains parts with an opacity other than 1, then their effective opacity will be adjusted proportionally.
        Parameters:
        opacity - the master opacity value for the item
